name: OrganismsTestsByMicroscopicObservationByGramStain
title: Organisms (Tests by Microscopic Observation by Gram Stain)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with microscopic observation by gram stain),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: microscopic observation|gram stain),(Exclusion Criteria: )
